page.title: 09My School
page.content: Our school is in a village, it has 30 children. Some children come by bus or car, others live in the village.There are usually 4 or 5 children in each year group. We only have 2 full-time teachers and 2 part-time teachers.We all have jobs like answering the telephone, looking after the library and our animals.There are only two rooms,one for the infants and one for the juniors.We go swimming every week and we have lessons like maths, art, sewing,writing,English and spelling.We also have music lessons.We start school at the age of 5 and finish at 11.School starts at 5 to 9 and ends at 20 past 3.We have a computer and we can play games on it at playtimes.Each morning we have assembly and one of our teachers reads a story and asks us questions about it.Nearly everyone has school dinners,8 bring packed lunches.
